ygData.messageBody:
Greetings and welcome,

Any tips for a newbie ,,, <smiles>

Thats a big order and an open ended one.

FIRST ... its a game .. so have fun.
Second .. do alot of research offline
Third .. ask questions .. often
Fourth ,, take the time to make friends



--- gibb@... wrote:
> Hey,
> I'm new to the Everquest world. My friends have
> hounded me to start
> playing. So here I am, I ordered Everquest today. Is
> there any tips a
> newbie should know? What are some of the best races?
> Any help would
> be good!!!
> Thanks
> Shaun
